name: Agresor
overview: Agresor is a Polish crosshairs shooter. The game takes place on a single location. The player's task is to track down and kill all the enemies, avoiding killing any innocent civilians. A new enemy appears every few seconds. The player may select one of three available weapons: machine gun, bazooka, grenade. Targeting enemies involves moving viewfinder to the right, left, up or down and killing the bandit as fast as possible. All remaining on board enemies take energy points with every single shot. Grenade, as the most powerful weapon, kills all the characters currently present on board.
